member.name: T:Sysinternals.Debug.NativeMethods
member.summary: A class to wrap all the native code needed by this assembly.

member.name: F:Sysinternals.Debug.NativeMethods.hProcMon
member.summary: The handle to the Process Monitor log device.

member.name: M:Sysinternals.Debug.NativeMethods.CTL_CODE(System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Builds the control code for the Process Monitor driver access.

member.name: M:Sysinternals.Debug.NativeMethods.CreateFile(System.String,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.IntPtr,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.IntPtr)
member.remarks: This is only used for opening the Process Monitor log handle, hence the default parameters.

member.name: M:Sysinternals.Debug.NativeMethods.ProcMonDebugOutput(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Does the actual tracing to Process Monitor.
member.param: The formatting arguments for the message
member.returns: True if the trace succeeded, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Sysinternals.Debug.NativeMethods.IOCTL_EXTERNAL_LOG_DEBUGOUT
member.summary: Gets the IO Control code for the ProcMon log.

member.name: T:Sysinternals.Debug.ProcessMonitorTraceListener
member.summary: Implements a that redirects output to Sysinternal's Process Monitor program.

member.name: M:Sysinternals.Debug.ProcessMonitorTraceListener.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a trace message to Process Monitor.

member.name: M:Sysinternals.Debug.ProcessMonitorTraceListener.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a trace message to Process Monitor.
